title: ‘We Are Not Afraid of UAE’: Visma-Lease a Bike Prepares Vingegaard Pyrénées Power Play
content:
Vingegaard suggests Pyrenean stages suit him better, despite ‘question mark’ over last-week staying power after curtailed preparation.

Read the full article at ‘We Are Not Afraid of UAE’: Visma-Lease a Bike Prepares Vingegaard Pyrénées Power Play on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
